thread.section_title: Le Royal Monceau-Raffles Paris - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Amazing Hotel
thread.title_full: Amazing Hotel - Review of Le Royal Monceau-Raffles Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Queenhamm
title: Amazing Hotel
text:
I have had the privilege of staying at some fine hotels throughout my life and this hotel is by far the nicest property I have EVER stayed in. This hotel is amazing. They have an art gallery in the hotel and the bar is the place where the beautiful come on a Saturday night. Try the Hot Chocolate with a shot of Baileys. .. life changing.
The staff is kind, attentive and professional. It will not be my last visit.
